flavorText:
"Our lances' reach had been our saving grace in our fight against the hive. Now even that advantage is taken from us."
—Adom Capashen, Benalish knight

foreignData.flavorText: „Die Reichweite unserer Stangenwaffen war bislang im Kampf mit dem Schwarm unsere Rettung. Jetzt haben wir selbst diesen Vorteil nicht mehr." —Adom Capashen, Benalischer Ritter
foreignData.name: Speiender Remasuri

foreignData.flavorText: "El alcance de nuestras lanzas era nuestra salvación en la lucha contra la colmena. Ahora hasta esa ventaja nos es arrebatada." —Ádom Capashen, caballero benalita
foreignData.name: Fragmentado escupidor
foreignData.text: Todos los Fragmentados tienen la habilidad de dañar primero.

foreignData.flavorText: « La portée de nos lances avait assuré notre survie bien des fois contre l'essaim. Mais à présent, nous ne disposons plus de cet avantage. » —Adom Capashen, chevalier bénalian
foreignData.name: Slivoïde cracheur

foreignData.flavorText: "La portata delle nostre lance è stata la nostra salvezza nella lotta contro l'alveare. Ma ora ci è stato tolto anche questo vantaggio." —Adom Capashen, cavaliere di Benalia
foreignData.name: Tramutante Sputante
foreignData.text: Tutti i Tramutanti hanno attacco improvviso.

foreignData.flavorText: 我らの槍の長さは、我らが群れと戦うときの助けだった。 しかし、今やその優位さすらも失われてしまった。 ――ベナリアの騎士、エイドム・キャパシェン
foreignData.name: 吐毒スリヴァー
foreignData.text: すべてのスリヴァーは先制攻撃を持つ。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — スリヴァー

foreignData.flavorText: "O alcance de nossas lanças têm sido nossa bênção na luta contra a colônia. Agora até mesmo essa vantagem nos foi tomada." — Adom Capashen, cavaleiro de Benália
foreignData.name: Fractius Cuspidor

foreignData.flavorText: «Только длина наших копий спасала нас в бою против роя. Теперь даже это преимущество исчезло». — Адом Капашен, Беналишский рыцарь
foreignData.name: Плюющаяся Щепка

foreignData.flavorText: 「我军长枪的攻击距离一直是对抗母巢的利器。 现在就连这优势都已不再。」 ～宾纳里亚骑士艾栋‧卡帕轩
foreignData.name: 喷吐裂片妖
foreignData.text: 所有裂片妖具有先攻异能。

name: Spitting Sliver

rulings.text: Abilities that Slivers grant, as well as power/toughness boosts, are cumulative. However, for some abilities, like flying, having more than one instance of the ability doesn’t provide any additional benefit.
If the creature type of a Sliver changes so it’s no longer a Sliver, it will no longer be affected by its own ability. Its ability will continue to affect other Sliver creatures.

text: All Sliver creatures have first strike.
